scripts.build:cjs: rimraf ../../dist/packages/repoman/cjs && npx tsc src/index.ts --outDir ../../dist/packages/repoman/cjs --module commonjs --lib es2022 --moduleResolution node --downlevelIteration --esModuleInterop --target ES2022 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --moduleResolution node --sourceMap
scripts.build:esm: rimraf ../../dist/packages/repoman/esm && npx tsc src/index.ts --outDir ../../dist/packages/repoman/esm --module es2022 --lib es2022 --moduleResolution node --downlevelIteration --esModuleInterop --target ES2022 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --moduleResolution node --sourceMap
scripts.build:types: rimraf ../../dist/packages/repoman/types && npx tsc src/index.ts --outDir ../../dist/packages/repoman/types --module es2022 --lib es2022 --moduleResolution node --downlevelIteration --esModuleInterop --target ES2022 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --moduleResolution node --declaration --declarationMap --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:types
